verbose_text: Furthermore, pretreatment with LY294002, an inhibitor of phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K), significantly impaired the LIF induced upregulation of p-AKT and Tbx-3 in the marmoset iPSCs, suggesting that the PI3K / Akt signaling pathway is involved in this regulation.
evidence: phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K), significantly impaired the LIF-induced upregulation of p-AKT and Tbx-3
